name: Monkey Jump+ - The Craziest Jumpers Ever!
name_original: Monkey Jump+ - The Craziest Jumpers Ever!
description:
Warning: Insanely addictive! Please proceed with caution.

Do you love jumping? I hope not, because this game will make you do it.

You fall, you die! You have to jump on the clouds and keep your score high to set a new record.

Are you ready?

From prime-time sitcoms (BIG BANG THEORY) to late night TV (JIMMY FALLON) to a fashion accessory for pop stars (LADY GAGA), Crazy Jump is EVERYWHERE! It's a cultural craze, a hot new trend!

Download now, until it is FREE!
